flawed_nl_solution:
There are 40 + 70 = <<40+70=110>>110 oranges and apples altogether .
He sold 40 x 0.25 = <<40*0.25=10>>10 pieces of oranges.
He sold 70 x 0.5 = <<70*0.5=53>>53 pieces of apples.
So, Tom was left with 110 - 10 - 53 = <<110-10-53=47>>47 pieces.
#### 47

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
